#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

int t;
int c, m, w, n, ans;
int rc, rm, rw;

int main()
{
    cin >> t;
    while (t--) {
        cin >> n >> m >> w >> c;
        w = min(w, 2*m);
        c = min(c, (m+w)*4);
        c = min(c, (4*n)/5);
        n-=c;
        w = min(w, (2*n)/3);
        n -= w;
        m = min(m, n);
        cout << m << " " << w << " " << c << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
